text: Hi all, I'm new here and just shared an intro that probably captures it best, but I'm typically "the content person" or "the comms person" or the content marketer/content strategist, or more often all of these! I'm looking for a new opportunity to help an organization grow its brand, attract and engage new audiences, and acquire customers through the optimized content and digital experiences I create. I run the gamut in terms of long form and short form, as well as thrive in places where I can build and nurture a team of writers, producers, and designers to manage websites and content. I'm in the SF Bay Area, but am looking for something remote. More about me here: <https://merryrichter.com/> and here <http://linkedin.com/in/merryrichter/>. Hope to hear from you with any relevant opportunities and/or tips about great recruiters who can help me find unadvertised roles. Thanks in advance!

attachments.fallback: The Content Queen: Home - The Content Queen
attachments.text: I'm Merry. I'm all about content...so much so that my coworkers started calling me "The Content Queen," and the name stuck! I write about life, work, and the occasional zombie. I've been a professional blogger for years, writing about enterprise software, HR, pop culture, and more. Happy reading!
attachments.title: Home - The Content Queen

text: hey Chris I’d be happy to chat. EditorNinja is a copy editing as a service service (ha!), but our editors also give feedback to writers about their copy. All my editors are MFA-level trained editors and professional writers. They live to help people write better.
